data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chłond, Dominik (2018): A taxonomic revision of the genus Sirthenea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Reduviidae) of the Old World. Zootaxa 4520 (1): 1-85, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4520.1.1|47 occurrences
